Interface IntDelta

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDelta, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IEnumDelta, IIntervalDelta
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnumDelta, IntervalDelta, NoDelta, OneValueDelta

    public interface IntDelta
extends IDelta
    An empty interface for delta dedicated to integer variable
